ShapeRepresentation.name: ShapeRepresentation
ShapeRepresentation.description: Contains information about the shape of an org. The shape of an org includes licenses and limits information. You can easily create scratch orgs based on a source org’s shape.

Description.description: A free-form text field for you to enter a description of this org shape. This field has a maximum length of 255 characters.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date when the org shape was last referenced. This field is read-only.

LastViewedDate.description: Date when the org shape was last viewed. This field is read-only.

Name.description: The alias for the org shape.

Status.description: Status of this org shape. You can use an org shape when it’s Active. This field is read-only.
